languages.text: Под стоны сирен, грохот закрывающихся ставней и далекий гул варп-двигателя неизвестная воля насильно притянула Лорд-капитана в Санктум Навис — к тварям с ожившего холста, уже стиснувшим горло Леди-Навигатора. Кассия задыхалась, пыталась кричать, в ужасе протянула руку... и начала медленно погружаться в свою же картину.

traits.locale_text: Под стоны сирен, грохот закрывающихся ставней, далекий гул вапр-двигателя и ослепляющие вспышки люменов неизвестная воля насильно притягивает Вольного Торговца в Санктум Навис... К демонам с ожившего холста, уже стиснувшим горло Леди-Навигатора. Кассия задыхается, пытается кричать, в ужасе протягивает руку, пытаясь ухватиться за Лорд-капитана... И начинает медленно погружаться в свою же картину.

languages.text: Amid the shrieks of sirens, the clanging of shutters, and the distant hum of the warp engine, some unknown will pulled the Lord Captain into the Sanctum Navis, toward the creatures from the living canvas that had already gripped the Lady Navigator's throat. Horrified, almost out of breath, and struggling to scream, Cassia stretched out her hand... and began slowly sinking into her own painting.
languages.original_text: Под стоны сирен, грохот закрывающихся ставней и далекий гул варп-двигателя неизвестная воля насильно притянула Лорд-капитана в Санктум Навис — к тварям с ожившего холста, уже стиснувшим горло Леди-Навигатора. Кассия задыхалась, пыталась кричать, в ужасе протянула руку... и начала медленно погружаться в свою же картину.

traits.locale_text: Amid the shrieks of sirens, the clanging of shutters, and the distant hum of the warp engine, some unknown will pulled the Lord Captain into the Sanctum Navis, toward the creatures from the living canvas that had already gripped the Lady Navigator's throat. Horrified and almost out of breath, Cassia, struggling to scream, stretched her hand out... and began slowly sinking into her own painting.

Horrified and almost out of breath, Cassia, struggling to scream, stretched her hand out... and began slowly sinking into her own painting.

Horrified, almost out of breath, and struggling to scream, Cassia stretched out her hand... and began slowly sinking into her own painting.

Amid the shrieks of sirens, the clanging of shutters, and the distant hum of the warp engine, some unknown will pulled the Lord Captain into the Sanctum Navis, toward the creatures from the living canvas that had already gripped the Lady Navigator's throat. Horrified, almost out of breath, and struggling to scream, Cassia stretched out her hand... and began slowly sinking into her own painting.

Amid the shrieks of sirens, the clanging of shutters, and the distant hum of the warp engine, some unknown will pulled the Lord Captain into the Sanctum Navis, toward the creatures from the living canvas that had already gripped the Lady Navigator's throat. Horrified, almost out of breath, and struggling to scream, Cassia stretched out her hand... and began slowly sinking into her own painting.

languages.text: 甲高いサイレン、ガラガラと鳴るシャッター、そしてワープエンジンが遠くでうなる音のただ中で、何者かの意志がロード・キャプテンをサンクトゥム・ネイヴィスに入り、怪物へと向かうよう説得した。生きた画布から生まれた怪物は航宙士の首をすでに握っていた。恐怖し、呼吸が止まりそうで必死に叫ぼうともがくカシアは己の手を伸ばし…自ら描いた絵にゆっくり沈み始めた。
languages.original_text: Amid the shrieks of sirens, the clanging of shutters, and the distant hum of the warp engine, some unknown will pulled the Lord Captain into the Sanctum Navis, toward the creatures from the living canvas that had already gripped the Lady Navigator's throat. Horrified, almost out of breath, and struggling to scream, Cassia stretched out her hand... and began slowly sinking into her own painting.

traits.locale_text: 甲高いサイレン、ガラガラと鳴るシャッター、そしてワープエンジンが遠くでうなる音のただ中で、何者かの意志がロード・キャプテンをサンクトゥム・ネイヴィスに入り、怪物へと向かうよう説得した。生きた画布から生まれた怪物は航宙士の首をすでに握っていた。恐怖し、呼吸が止まりそうで必死に叫ぼうともがくカシアは己の手を伸ばし…自ら描いた絵にゆっくり沈み始めた。

languages.text: 在警报器的尖叫声、百叶窗的咣当声与亚空间引擎的嗡鸣声中，某种未知的意志将舰长大人拉进了导航者圣所，让舰长大人一步步走向那些怪物。那些从画里钻出来的怪物已经扼住了卡西娅的喉咙。卡西娅惊恐万分，几乎喘不过气来，挣扎着想要尖叫。她伸出手……慢慢地沉入自己的画中。
languages.original_text: Amid the shrieks of sirens, the clanging of shutters, and the distant hum of the warp engine, some unknown will pulled the Lord Captain into the Sanctum Navis, toward the creatures from the living canvas that had already gripped the Lady Navigator's throat. Horrified, almost out of breath, and struggling to scream, Cassia stretched out her hand... and began slowly sinking into her own painting.

traits.locale_text: 在警报器的尖叫声、百叶窗的咣当声与亚空间引擎的嗡鸣声中，某种未知的意志将舰长大人拉进了导航者圣所，让舰长大人一步步走向那些怪物。那些从画里钻出来的怪物已经扼住了卡西娅的喉咙。卡西亚惊恐万分，几乎喘不过气来，挣扎着想要尖叫。她伸出手……慢慢地沉入自己的画中。

languages.text: Au milieu du vacarme assourdissant des sirènes, des bruits métalliques des obturateurs hors de contrôle et du vrombissement du moteur Warp, une force inconnue a attiré {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} dans le sanctum navis, vers les créatures de la toile qui enserraient déjà le cou de la dame navigatrice dans leurs griffes. Horrifiée, à bout de souffle et incapable de hurler son désespoir, Cassia a tendu la main... tout en commençant à disparaître dans son propre tableau.
languages.original_text: Amid the shrieks of sirens, the clanging of shutters, and the distant hum of the warp engine, some unknown will pulled the Lord Captain into the Sanctum Navis, toward the creatures from the living canvas that had already gripped the Lady Navigator's throat. Horrified, almost out of breath, and struggling to scream, Cassia stretched out her hand... and began slowly sinking into her own painting.

traits.locale_text: Au milieu du vacarme assourdissant des sirènes, des bruits métalliques des obturateurs hors de contrôle et du vrombissement du moteur Warp, une force inconnue a attiré {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} dans le sanctum navis, vers les créatures de la toile qui enserraient déjà le cou de la dame navigatrice dans leurs griffes. Horrifiée, à bout de souffle et incapable de hurler son désespoir, Cassia a tendu la main... tout en commençant à disparaître dans son propre tableau.

languages.text: Entre las estridentes sirenas, el golpeteo de las persianas y el zumbido lejano del motor de disformidad, alguna fuerza desconocida tiró {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán hasta el Sanctum Navis, hacia las criaturas del lienzo viviente que ya tenían cogida por la garganta a la lady Navegante. Horrorizada, casi sin aliento y luchando por gritar, Cassia extendió la mano... y poco a poco empezó a hundirse en su propio cuadro.
languages.original_text: Amid the shrieks of sirens, the clanging of shutters, and the distant hum of the warp engine, some unknown will pulled the Lord Captain into the Sanctum Navis, toward the creatures from the living canvas that had already gripped the Lady Navigator's throat. Horrified, almost out of breath, and struggling to scream, Cassia stretched out her hand... and began slowly sinking into her own painting.

traits.locale_text: Entre las estridentes sirenas, el golpeteo de las persianas y el zumbido lejano del motor de disformidad, alguna fuerza desconocida tiró {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán hasta el Sanctum Navis, hacia las criaturas del lienzo viviente que ya tenían cogida por la garganta a la lady Navegante. Horrorizada, casi sin aliento y luchando por gritar, Cassia extendió la mano... y poco a poco empezó a hundirse en su propio cuadro.

languages.text: Inmitten des Kreischens der Sirenen, des Krachens der Jalousien und des fernen Brummens des Warp-Triebwerks hat ein unbekannter Wille den Lord Captain in das Sanctum Navis gezogen, zu den Kreaturen aus der lebenden Leinwand, welche die Lady Navigator schon an der Kehle gepackt hatten. Entsetzt, kurz vor dem Ersticken und unfähig zu schreien streckte Cassia ihre Hand aus ... und begann langsam in ihrem eigenen Gemälde zu versinken.
languages.original_text: Amid the shrieks of sirens, the clanging of shutters, and the distant hum of the warp engine, some unknown will pulled the Lord Captain into the Sanctum Navis, toward the creatures from the living canvas that had already gripped the Lady Navigator's throat. Horrified, almost out of breath, and struggling to scream, Cassia stretched out her hand... and began slowly sinking into her own painting.

traits.locale_text: Inmitten des Kreischens der Sirenen, des Krachens der Jalousien und des fernen Brummens des Warp-Triebwerks hat ein unbekannter Wille den Lord Captain in das Sanctum Navis gezogen, zu den Kreaturen aus der lebenden Leinwand, welche die Lady Navigator schon an der Kehle gepackt hatten. Entsetzt, kurz vor dem Ersticken und unfähig zu schreien streckte Cassia ihre Hand aus ... und begann langsam in ihrem eigenen Gemälde zu versinken.

languages.text: Öten sirenler, çarpan kepenkler ve uzaktan uğuldayan öteboyut motorunun gürültüsü arasında meçhul bir iradeye kapılan Lord Kaptan, kendini Navis Kutağı'na atar atmaz canlı tablodan çıkıp Leydi Rotacı'nın gırtlağına yapışan yaratıkların peşine düştü. Dehşete kapılan, nefessiz kalan ve çığlık atmak için çırpınan Cassia elini uzattı. Ardından yavaş yavaş kendi tablosuna gömülmeye başladı.
languages.original_text: Amid the shrieks of sirens, the clanging of shutters, and the distant hum of the warp engine, some unknown will pulled the Lord Captain into the Sanctum Navis, toward the creatures from the living canvas that had already gripped the Lady Navigator's throat. Horrified, almost out of breath, and struggling to scream, Cassia stretched out her hand... and began slowly sinking into her own painting.

traits.locale_text: Öten sirenler, çarpan kepenkler ve uzaktan uğuldayan öteboyut motorunun gürültüsü arasında, meçhul bir iradeye kapılan Lord Kaptan, kendini Navis Kutağı'na atar atmaz canlı tablodan çıkıp Leydi Rotacı'nın gırtlağına yapışan yaratıkların peşine düştü. Dehşete kapılan, nefessiz kalan ve çığlık atmak için çırpınan Cassia elini uzattı... Ve yavaş yavaş kendi tablosuna gömülmeye başladı.
